caption: Very good bagel sandwiches

My husband & I ordered bagels & a sandwich for breakfast while visiting chicago on vacation. We ordered for pick up and when we got back to the hotel to eat it we were disappointed to find that they had burnt the bagels and the sandwich.
The staff is super friendly and kind. My bagel sandwich was super tasty and the prices are good. Thank you Einstein Bros. :D
Concise-
Their bagels were good. The coffee was not as exciting
Food is simple and good.

Negative star if i can. Arrogant staff with disregard to customer service. When I went back to show them the WRONG sandwich they gave me, they said its a double egg white (2 in 1),  what a load of BS.  How is this a double egg white Santa Fe sandwich (mine on left and as advertised on right by Einstein). $8 for this is ripped off.
Small but an amazing place!
10/10 Definitely would come again. BEST BAGEL I'VE HAVE EVER HAD!
We tried the ham and cheese and it’s good, we also had one with bacon. Nice place have breakfast. Prices are reasonable.

This location always seems to be out of bagels and early. This has happened on numerous occasions. It’s like the staff makes one batch and stops doing their job for the rest of the day. Not to mention they are not very pleasant. Avoid this location.
Standard Einstein to get your bagel fix as you set out to conquer the city!
Not sure why it takes 20 min + for two bagels.

I live in the neighborhood and I’m a regular. During the last couple months - and specifically today - service has gone to zero.  Today my app and email show the $7 weekend special for 6 bagels and tub of cream cheese (shmear).   The cashier couldn’t process it and the supervisor says it’s not in their computer.  Just the bagels part is ok.  Customer.  Email.  App.  We are wrong?  What gives?  You’ve lost a loyal customer for many years.

Last. Visit. Ever.  Truly, I am a fan of EBB but I have had it with this location.  The store is convenient to the bus stop I take to town and I love the menu. However, this location has got to get its act together.  I should have turned away this morning when I saw 8 people in the order line and several more waiting for their orders. I placed a standard order and 17 minutes later, after everyone behind me had walked out with their orders (and long waits for them as well) I had to remind the staff of my order which clearly had been overlooked. Granted, one of the staff asked if there was anything complimentary they could provide me while I waited further, but at that point, I just needed my order to be complete. To boot, the order was hastily made and made incorrectly (I've just opened it up to eat it).  Every time I leave this location I swear it's my last but I have been willing to forgive past incidents of long waits, poor staff organization, as well as general under staffing. However after this morning -- I'm out.  Not worth experiencing this location's inefficiencies any longer.

(Translated by Google) Everything I ate was delicious, super recommended, if I could put more stars I would. Excellent❤️  (Original) Todo lo que comi fue delicioso, super recomendado, si les pudiera poner mas estrellas lo haría. Excelente❤️

I walked into Einstein Bagel ready to purchase a bagel and noticed gnats flying on the pastry. I quietly whispered to one of the employees that gnats were on the pastry. She said I will let my manager know and turned around and rolled her eyes. She did not remove the pastry or fan off the gnats. They need to have a glass to protect the food!!!!!
service is terrible and slow but food is decent
Pretty good service and good food. Too bad they closed the one on Fairbanks though!
(Translated by Google) Excellent bagels!  (Original) Bagels excelentes!

I only have so much time to get food before i have to get ready and go to work. So I called this location and they told me they could place a pickup order. so i placed it. one simple bacon egg and cheese. they told me it was fine to place a pick up order. i didn't want to go in and wait because it usually takes forever so i was trying to save time. sure enough i come in and they forgot to make my sandwich. and i came in 20 mins later. i had to wait for a new one. now i have to run home eat my sandwich and hurry to get ready for work. totally unacceptable. no discount or anything to rectify the situation either. horrible.
Great service . Fresh food . I’ll be back for sure
Bagels now come with free wax paper, but not the actual sides they're supposed to.

My friend and I went there this morning when we were running behind schedule. The food was AMAZING. I got the Santa Fe and I’m dying to go back.  The food was ready in a timely manner. They were kind of busy so it wasn’t like it came out instantaneously like it seems most people expect these days.  Definitely going back before my trip in Chicago ends.
Prepare to wait....and wait....and wait.
Be prepared to wait 15 minutes and for extremely limited bagel selections

We waited 2 hours for an order of bagels via grubhub and the restaurant canceled our order. We called and they immediately said we’d need to call grubhub refusing to give us context. They finally admitted that they got “too busy” and had to stop taking orders even though ours had been in for a couple of hours. Understand things happen but they should have taken responsibility and owned the issue and tried to make it right rather than shifting the blame.

Terribly slow service,  order 2 plain non-toasted bagels with plain cream cheese to go, ordered at 10:23am & ready at 10:57am.  Just bad management and execution...  Never going to the location again.
Love this bagel chain, but this location is the worst I’ve been to. Very run down and food but as good as my local store in Long Beach. Great bagels, try another location.
Slow, disorganised and dirty
Horrible wait for a bagel with schmear.

I've visited this location a few times and they have always been consistently prompt and accurate. My favorites are the Nova Lux paired with an iced Caramel High Rise.  Update: Still in love with this place and excited about the Super Nova Lux. Also huge thanks to Zara. Each time I have visited she's been here and is communicative, friendly, attentive, and always gets my order right! Thank you Zara for making this my favorite location.
Rude and bad service. Terrible.
Great service!
I dream about these bagels

It was the third time I called about the same problem, and I was really annoyed at that point, when I decided to give these guys a shot. I gotta say that they weren t cheap, but they were the only ones who could fix it on the first try and I haven t had to call anyone else. I guess you get what you pay for

It was my first time at an Einstein Bagel. The staff was friendly and helpful with recommendations.  I found the store to be clean and found a table to eat.  Lots of guests enjoying the morning paper or grab n go items.  Delicious food!
Ventilation NONE. ONCE YOU GET IN  YOU ALL STINK,  . INSIDE FULL OF SMOKE FROM THE KITCHEN. CARPET VERY DIRTY RESTROOMS...THE WORST IN CHICAGO AREA. COSTUMER SERVICE  REALLY BAD A BAD PLACE TO STOP.
Great service and they have a barista Caribou coffee on site. Love it
Great Food !!!!!!!°
Worst. Service. Ever. 45 minutes for a bagel?! I won’t be coming back here !
Understaffed or incompetent- not sure. They failed to complete my order of two bagels. I had to ask for my money back after 30 minutes.
I have eaten here a few times now. The staff is friendly, and the food is very good, especially for breakfast.
Cheap place with Wide variety of bagels. Nice service and short waiting for food
(Translated by Google) Service is poor and unfriendly to foreigners 😦  (Original) 服务很差，对外国人不友好😦
My breakfast bagel was awesome. I had the one egg farmhouse on an asiago bagel. Loved it.
Grimy, dirty, bad coffee, arrogant and  unattentive staff.  An experience to forget.
The food was mediocre, and the wait after ordering was very long (~20 minutes standing there). When the bagels finally arrived, there were many mistakes with the food we ordered.
It was cold outside, this exactly what the Bagel Bros. Had in mind, great coffee and bagels!!!!!
Was amazing❤️❤️we love it yameeeeee
Low quality food, drink fountain useless, bathrooms dirty, etc.  Poorly managed in general.  Not up to the standards I usually expect from other Einstein's locations.
Arrived at 9 am.. run out of some begal, no English tea, coffee run out..
Consistent, though on Sunday morning understandingly busy and therefore a bit slow and chaotic.
Best for breakfast 🍩
Worst experience ever..Super slow and cold bagels.We went twice and they hardly had any bagels left.
Very fresh tasty bagels.. Best breakfast I had so far. Simple and healthy..

(Translated by Google) Sandwiches are served with beagle breads, excellent breakfast, and full hunger throughout the day  (Original) يقدم السندويشات بخبز البيجل وممتاز الفطور وسد الجوع طوال اليوم ..و أجرة مميزة

Awful service. Purchased dozen bagels, diet coke bottle, and a jug of coffee. Was asked if I wanted my bagels slice (which I said yes)--they were never sliced. I was handed my dozen bagels, and the woman at the counter said "here you go" with no indication that my coffee was coming. Once I received my coffee (from a kind gentleman who seemed to be new), i asked for half and half--and the woman curtly said "hold on" with her pointer finger and continued to prepare her bagels without helping me. Poor preparation before opening, poor attitude, poor service.

The woman in the hijab ( I don't recall her name) was very rude  when I walk in and you to the counter that says order here she make eye contact and doesn't say anything I wait about 8 minutes then ask , "are you taking orders here" she then turn to me and says in a rude tone " the line starts over there when it gets busy we take orders here" at first I truly thought i was in the wrong but I looked around to found a sign giving such instructions and there was non so I used common sense go to the sign that says order here , this could've been handled much more professionally because of that experience I chose to leave
I ordered from them online through grub hub. I only received half of my order and they refused to refund me.

Called and spoke with Zara to place an order of a dozen onion bagels.  I was told it would take over an hour to prepare.  I put the order in and patiently waited.  I called back an hour later and the bagels were never put in.  Pretty upsetting.  I'll be ordering Elsewhere
Lovely place!
Service is great and the food is quick to come and tastes amazing 👌🏻

I wanted a bagel until I noticed bugs flighting around in the case, I tried to inform an employee but she seemed annoyed when I bought the matter up. I will not eat there again until after its health inspection.

A few months ago I'd have rated 3 stars, but they cook they eggs in house now, so that's a HUGE improvement. They can be a bit slow in the morning, even when there isn't much of a line, but it's probably the best fast breakfast in the area.  There used to be a tiny, older Asian woman that worked there. She would compliment everyone on their names. She made the start of your day special. I haven't seen her lately, so the place has lost all of its personality.  Still good food, though.
Friendly staff!
Love this place
Good food but slow service.
Delicious bagels and many options to choose
Chain bagel place. They do have a grab and go deal that is pretty good.
Great choice of great tasting bagels. A little costly but not as bad as some of the hipster bagel joints and these bagels are actually worth the cost!
Tasty bagels and quick, friendly service, but nothing exceptional.  Exactly what I expected.  An easy, quick bagel on the go.

Usually very quick place to grab a fresh bagel and coffee. Occasionally they are overwhelmed by customers and you have to wait to order and to get your bagel. They almost always have coffee ready to go as well. Inexpensive, for being so close to Michigan Ave.
(Translated by Google) Excellent bagels. We went back twice!  (Original) Excellents bagels. Nous y sommes retournés deux fois!
Some of the best bagels ever! So fresh, and always a good selection of them!!! :)
Awesome. Great selection of fresh bagels and other cheeky treats.. A bottomless coffee offering several different self serve brews
